description: Asoke Place  Sukhumvit 21 Bangkok condo for sale is located near BTS Asoke, MRT Sukhumvit, and Srinakharinwirot University
detail:
Asoke Place condominium offers 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom condo units for sale and rent. It was completed in 1996. This Asoke condo in Bangkok CBD comprises a single building having 250 apartments on 40 floors. The building is very well maintained
Apartments in Asoke Place are nice even if they are a few years older - they have the most important features and style. All the apartments have wide windows from floor to ceiling, higher ceiling heights, and balconies.
